page.title: 04farms by G.Williams/A.Barnes
page.content: In Ambrosden there are 4 farms:2mixed, 1 pig & 1 chicken farm.My dad & other villagers are very angry with the chick - en farm because their lorries spill some of their contents on the road but the County Council won't stop them & it could cause accidents. On Cutter Bridge we found a sign.On the top round part it said County Boundary.On the long bit it said Bucks on one side & Oxon on the other.We came to Furze Grounds Farm.They have 1plough 2 combine harvesters,45 cows,17 sheep,2 working dogs,3 grassfields&6 cornfields & the farmhouse has 10 rooms.Mr & Mrs Berry have farmed there for 7 years.It is shown as Folly Farm on the map but Mr Berry knocked that down & rebuilt Furze Grounds Farm in a slightly different area. There are lots of foxes there which sometimes come right up to the farm front door.
